Description: Blue and white glass eye-bead from a necklace; probably rod-formed in aquamarine blue-green glass with eye motifs trailed in navy blue and white.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.118, Tomb 57)
